typedef vnl_matrix_fixed
< float, 2, 2 > 		vnl_float_2x2

Detailed Description

2x2 matrix of float

vnl_float_2x2 is a vnl_matrix<float> of fixed size 2x2. It is merely a typedef for vnl_matrix_fixed<float,2,2>

Author:
Peter Vanroose
Date:
9 Febr 2003
